Text: Did you shrink it? If so, how and how much?

It's the main movie only, all extras removed.
About 82% of the original quality remains.
Only 18% or so was removed.

It's nearly impossible to see any visual difference from the original Criterion Collection DVD.

The audio commentary was left intact. Because it didn't take up much space, and it's interesting to listen to (if you're interested in the Titanic and stuff).

If somebody is really interested in this movie, he/she should help seeding it later.

The best my connection can do (upload speed) is 128kb/s. And when that is split over a large group of leechers, it will take some time..

So please people, help seed it after you complete it, for at least a week or more.

I have other stuff I plan to upload in the future and I won't be seeding this alone forever - if no one has an interest in helping seeding it, the torrent will die in a week or so.

It's a very rare (and good) movie, so some seeding help would be appriciated.

Hmm, this torrent is actually still alive I see.

I've long since deleted the DVD from my PC, so now it's up to you people to seed this rare movie and keep it alive...
